Speaker: Agent
Text: Call center, item return, role play.

Speaker: Agent
Text: Thank you for calling Summit Gear. My name is Chris.

Speaker: Agent
Text: How may I assist you?

Speaker: Customer
Text: Hi Chris. I ordered a winter jacket from your website and when it arrived it had a big stain on the sleeve.

Speaker: Agent
Text: Oh, I'm sorry to hear that. Was the package damaged when you received it?

Speaker: Customer
Text: No, it wasn't. I noticed the stain after I took it out of the plastic in the box.

Speaker: Customer
Text: The packaging was perfectly fine.

Speaker: Agent
Text: I see. Do you have your order number available?

Speaker: Customer
Text: Yes, just a second.

Speaker: Customer
Text: The order number is 03894701.

Speaker: Agent
Text: Thank you. Let me pull it up on my screen. Just a moment please.

Speaker: Agent
Text: Thanks.

Speaker: Agent
Text: Could I confirm your full name please?

Speaker: Customer
Text: Yes, it's Diana Stone.

Speaker: Agent
Text: Thank you, Miss Stone. I'm looking at your order.

Speaker: Agent
Text: This was for the woman's snow trek parka in Sage Green. Is that correct?

Speaker: Customer
Text: Yes, that's it. How long will it take to replace the jacket?

Speaker: Agent
Text: We can ship it out as soon as we receive the return item.

Speaker: Agent
Text: Could I email you a shipping label to print out?

Speaker: Customer
Text: So, I print out the label and mail it back in the original box. Do I have to pay for the shipping?

Speaker: Agent
Text: No, we will credit your account for the shipping. You can use the original box if it is still intact.

Speaker: Customer
Text: I understand. Then you'll send me another jacket?

Speaker: Agent
Text: Yes, let me just double check. We still have that size and color in stock.

Speaker: Customer
Text: Okay, thanks.

Speaker: Agent
Text: Hello, Miss Stone. I checked our inventory and we do have your size.

Speaker: Agent
Text: Unfortunately, we only have the jacket in Ocean Blue or Foggy Gray.

Speaker: Customer
Text: Oh, I see. I really like the green color. That's too bad.

Speaker: Agent
Text: It was a very popular color this season.

Speaker: Customer
Text: Okay, give me a second. I'll go with the ocean blue.

Speaker: Agent
Text: Alright, thank you, ma'am. We will send you another snow track parka jacket in the ocean blue.

Speaker: Customer
Text: I'll send the stain jacket back this afternoon.

Speaker: Agent
Text: Thank you, Miss Stone. Also, may I confirm your email address so I can send you the shipping label?

Speaker: Customer
Text: Yeah, sure. The address is Diana dot stone, 99 at gmail.com.

Speaker: Agent
Text: Thank you, Miss Stone. Let me just repeat that back. It's Diana dot stone, 99 at gmail.com.

Speaker: Customer
Text: Yes, that's right.

Speaker: Agent
Text: Thank you. I will send you the label within the next five minutes.

Speaker: Customer
Text: That sounds good.

Speaker: Agent
Text: Is there anything else I can help you with today?

Speaker: Customer
Text: No, that'll do it. Sorry. Could I have your name again?

Speaker: Agent
Text: My name is Christ, Miss Stone. Thank you again for calling Summit Gear.

Speaker: Customer
Text: Thanks for your help, Chris.

Speaker: Agent
Text: You're welcome.

Speaker: Customer
Text: Goodbye.

Speaker: Agent
Text: Remember to watch our other roleplay videos.
